revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #34 Durin |image = [[File:Durin.png]] |caption = This Berry is tremendously bitter. Just one bite is enough to instantly stop hiccups. |growtime = 6h 0m 0s |harvest = 33 berries |replant = 10% |points = 1,050 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *0 sweet *30 bitter *10 sour }} '''Durin''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding a [[Rabuta]] berry with at least 130, but no more than 160 points of bitter and no more than 80 points of all other flavours. The [[Rabuta]] berry will then have a chance to mutate into this berry. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" !!! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 2 hours 46 mins 40 secs || 3 hours 53 mins 20 secs || 5 hours || 6 hours - 12 hours |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:DurinTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:DurinTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:DurinTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 6 hours -
12 hours || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 4 hours -
8 hours || 48 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 2 hours 40 mins -
5 hours 20 mins || 32 mulch |} == Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Durin berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 50px;" | [[File:Rabuta.png|30px]]
